meanings.sent1: The cake she baked was superspecial with its colorful frosting.

meanings.definition: Of the highest quality or importance
meanings.sent1: The superspecial necklace was made of pure gold.
meanings.sent2: The superspecial award ceremony honored the best actors.
meanings.sent3: Her superspecial recipe always impressed her guests.
meanings.sent4: The superspecial bond between the siblings was unbreakable.
meanings.sent5: The superspecial book was cherished by all who read it.

meanings.definition: To treat or regard as highly important or significant
meanings.sent1: She would always superspecial her favorite mug by handwashing it.

meanings.sent3: The cat superspecials its favorite toy by carrying it everywhere.
